table.caption: Harper Renown
rows: You can stay in any Harper stronghold. While there, the Harpers provide you a {@book Modest lifestyle|XPHB|6|Lifestyle Expenses} for free.
You can buy Common potions and scrolls at Harper strongholds.
The first time your Renown Score reaches 10, you learn one persona from the Harper Personas table.
You receive a 15 percent discount when you buy potions, scrolls, and adventuring gear at Harper strongholds.
The first time your Renown Score reaches 25, you receive a {@item Harper Pin|FRAiF} (silver) and learn an additional persona from the {@area Harper Personas|367|x} table.
When you enter a settlement for the first time, local Harpers freely share any notable rumors and important intel with you.
The first time your Renown Score reaches 40, you receive a {@item Harper Pin|FRAiF} (golden) and learn an additional persona from the Harper Personas table.
You can request a single audience with the High Harpers. Once you use this reward, you can't do so again.
